Description: Handle of Thasian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp; uncertain symbol.
Curator's comments: Only known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.133, 11. For the stamp see Bon, A. and A., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos (Paris 1957), no. 576, where the symbol is taken as a palmette. Name Deinopas.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0025)
